product_name: Lezyne Mega Drive Front Bike Light
long_description: Sleek, compact and durable thanks to its machined aluminum body, the Lezyne Mega Drive Front Bike Light offers commuters, mountain bikers and evening riders 1,200 lumens to light up the night. 2 high-performance LEDs emit a 1,200-lumen beam that runs for 1.3 hrs. on high and 15 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. Specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting. Power Indicator button lets you check the power level any time. The Lezyne Mega Drive Front Bike Light includes a Lezyne wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
